title: Akshay Kumar to return to Awaraa Paagal Deewana sequel?
text:
It is common knowledge in the film industry that producer Firoz Nadiadwala and Akshay Kumar had a fall-out after Hera Pheri and its sequel, so much so that Akshay has gone missing in the third Hera Pheri film which is now being shot. That is likely to change in the near future.
Apparently Firoz, fresh and happy from the success of Welcome Back is in the mood to make up with his old friend. According to sources Firoz has already approached Akshay with the olive branch, namely the sequel to their 2002 hit Awaara Paagal Deewana . And Akshay has agreed in principle to return to the sequel.
Firoz doesn't deny the likelihood of a rapprochement. "Akshay may be in Awara Paagal Deewana sequel. Akshay along with Suniel Shetty, Paresh Rawal and Johnny Lever are the core cast of the franchise." Director Vikram Bhatt will no longer be part of Awaara Paagal Deewana .
